next-devtools.description: Next.js development tools - query errors, logs, page metadata, and project structure

sequential-thinking.description: Enhanced reasoning for complex problems like implementing checkout flows, cart logic, or data migrations

memory.description: Persistent memory across sessions - remembers project decisions, architecture patterns, and TODO progress

postgres.description: PostgreSQL database queries - inspect schema, query data, analyze performance (when using PostgreSQL instead of SQLite)

brave-search.description: Web search for researching Next.js 16 features, Stripe API updates, React 19 patterns, and library documentation

fetch.description: Fetch web resources - read API documentation, check npm package details, verify Stripe webhook formats

playwright.description: Browser automation for E2E testing - test checkout flows, cart operations, authentication, and blog navigation

git.description: Git operations - commits, branches, diffs, logs, and repository management

github.description: GitHub API access - create issues, manage PRs, query repository data, and track project progress

filesystem.description: File system operations - read/write files, manage directory structure (redundant with Claude Code but useful for other agents)
